title: Catering Information
text: â˜• Snacks and refreshments will be provided throughout the day as opposed to a lunch service. Dietary requirements will be accounted for and allergen information will be made available. It is your responsibility to check this with catering staff.

title: Inclusive Briefing Pack
text: We have prepared a Reboot Local Bristol Inclusive Briefing Pack which describes what you will experience at the event and includes accessibility information. A copy is stored on the Reboot Local Bristol event SharePoint site and some printed copies are available if you speak to a member of the Reboot Crew.
